short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Storm Tracker: Real-time hurricane, tornado, flood, fire & winter storm alerts across the USA with instant emergency notifications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NEW UPDATE

Storm Tracker now includes Winter Storm Alerts! Stay ahead of blizzards, ice storms, heavy snowfall and more with the same real-time notifications and customizable filters you trust. Our latest update expands coverage to ensure you’re prepared for every season.
Stay safe and prepared with Storm Tracker, your all-in-one real-time weather alert system for the USA. From hurricanes and tornadoes to floods, wildfires and now winter storms, this powerful browser extension ensures you’re always informed about critical weather events in your area, helping you protect yourself and your loved ones.

Key Features:

1. Real-Time Weather Alerts for All Major Events
 -Receive instant notifications for hurricanes 🌬️, tornadoes 🌪️, floods 🌊, wildfires 🔥 and now winter storms ❄️ (blizzards, ice storms, heavy snow).
- Get pop-up alerts in your browser with essential details, including event type, location, severity and impacted areas.

2. Customizable Alerts and Location Settings 🎛️
- Adjust your filters to prioritize specific events like severe blizzards, Category 5 hurricanes or wildfire advisories.
- Enable or disable notifications by event type and severity to focus on what matters most to you.
- Set a custom alert radius from 500 to 2000 miles or choose to monitor the entire USA.

3. Detailed Storm Information at Your Fingertips 🌐
- Click on any active alert to access comprehensive event details, including wind speed, temperature, snow accumulation and a full list of impacted areas.
- Search for specific regions or browse through active alerts to stay fully informed.

4. Weather Safety Guides for Every Event 
- Access step-by-step safety guides tailored to hurricanes, tornadoes, floods, wildfires and winter storms.
- Learn practical tips on what to do before, during and after each type of weather event to stay safe and prepared.

5. Easy-to-Understand Explanations 📚
- NEW! Hover over icons next to Emergency, Warning and Advisory levels to instantly learn what they mean.
- Our built-in glossary demystifies key weather terms like storm categories, watch levels and forecast certainty.

6. Seamless, User-Friendly Design 🛡️
- Intuitive and lightweight, the extension runs quietly in the background without slowing down your browser.
- Easily toggle between real-time alerts, maps and safety guides with our clean, organized interface.

Why Choose Storm Tracker?
Designed exclusively for USA residents, Storm Tracker delivers instant, real-time weather alerts tailored to your location. Whether you’re bracing for hurricanes in Florida, monitoring wildfire risks in California or preparing for blizzards in the Midwest, Storm Tracker ensures you’re always informed and ready to take action.

- No Need for Separate Apps: With Storm Tracker integrated into your browser, there’s no need to juggle multiple apps or check weather sites constantly. Get alerts instantly while browsing online.
- Stay Ahead of Every Event: Whether it’s a fast-approaching tornado or a looming winter storm, you’ll receive the details you need to act fast.
- Prepare Like a Pro: With detailed storm information, customizable alerts and expert safety guides, you can make smart, informed decisions to protect yourself and your family.

🚨 Please note: The Storm Tracker extension may not be able to provide real-time alerts if a VPN is enabled, as it could interfere with location-based services.
